message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $15,000. I think you'll find it's a fantastic deal for what it offers.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money on this product. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $10,000 is too low for me. Could you meet me halfway at $12,500?
I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
